message = "The house stood on a slight rise just on the edge of the village."
key = 3e9b8a463a57720d

## Blocks

| Ascii | Binary | Hex |
| ----- | ------ | --- |
| `"The hous"` | `01010100 01101000 01100101 00100000 01101000 01101111 01110101 01110011` | `54686520686f7573`
| `"e stood "` | `01100101 00100000 01110011 01110100 01101111 01101111 01100100 00100000` | `652073746f6f6420`
| `"on a sli"` | `01101111 01101110 00100000 01100001 00100000 01110011 01101100 01101001` | `6f6e206120736c69`
| `"ght rise"` | `01100111 01101000 01110100 00100000 01110010 01101001 01110011 01100101` | `6768742072697365`
| `" just on"` | `00100000 01101010 01110101 01110011 01110100 00100000 01101111 01101110` | `206a757374206f6e`
| `" the edg"` | `00100000 01110100 01101000 01100101 00100000 01100101 01100100 01100111` | `2074686520656467`
| `"e of the"` | `01100101 00100000 01101111 01100110 00100000 01110100 01101000 01100101` | `65206f6620746865`
| `" village"` | `00100000 01110110 01101001 01101100 01101100 01100001 01100111 01100101` | `2076696c6c616765`
| `"."` | `00101110 00000111 00000111 00000111 00000111 00000111 00000111 00000111` | `2e07070707070707`

In the last block, because there is only 1 byte of message left, you pad the rest of the bytes in the block with the number of bytes which are empty (in this case, 7).
